Class CircleCoordinates

java.lang.Object
  |
  +--Coordinates
        |
        +--CircleCoordinates
public class CircleCoordinates
extends Coordinates

Provides the Points that make up a circle. Maintains an enumeration of the points, which can be accessed using hasMorePoints() and nextPoint(). The enumeration can be reinitialized with enumerate().

Version:
1.0 -- March 30, 1999
Author:
C. Vickery
